title: Nice and Welcoming
review: A little museum that is very welcoming to tourists. A great display explaining spirituality and the beliefs of the Brahman people. They hold Yoga early in the morning and meditation at night and it is all free.

title: connecting to ancient india
review: this museum is good place to visit for one loving to know about hindu dharma spiritual things. add on is the yoga practice one can attend.

title: A interesting place
review: The place is full of spiritual things and for those who loves to find peace in these things and practices.

title: Museum & Yoga
review: A museum about spiritual things...thats a first when I was researching about places to visit in Agra and made sure I check the place out. Its a place where you will find a lot of information about what our ancestors has told about religion and spirituality. They also have yoga session in the morning, dont miss it.

title: Spiritual Museum
review: This museum is near to the tajmahal. Its a very great museum for spiritual things. This is very interesting place.

title: Totally Spiritual
review: The place is full of spirituality. Here you can find lots of information regarding your ancestors. The place is famous for its yoga session too.

title: A good concept to promote Yoga !!
review: This is really a nice concept to explore yourself spiritually. Just beside to Taj Mahal, this museum is located. Do visit.

title: Could not find great
review: I could not find anything very much great. So if you have ample time then think to go to this place.

title: nice spiritual museum
review: Agra Spiritual Museum is situated close to the Taj Mahal. It contains a wealth of local treasures, many of which are of religious significance. Part of the university complex, this spacious cultural attraction covers a large area and features many themed exhibits, based around man's spiritual quest. The Spiritual Museum is known locally in Agra for its imposing shikara-style facade and is also home to a collection of art works, including some impressive paintings of various descriptions.

title: Being Tourist youtube
review: It is spiritual place with mesuem yoga and meditation facility at the same place. Those who like peace and silence can visit this place. It is very close to the Taj

title: HOTEL ATULYAA TAJ
review: agra is a nice city for tourists. agra is heaven for tourists coming from all parts of the world, with beautiful historical monuments and nice hotels.
